thread.title: Susan
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text:
I use to use AARP for free to get my taxes done. yes, it's semi expensive getting my taxes done through R&G Brenner but so worth it because they get a much bigger refund back for me. Plus they are fast and efficient!! I also don't have to wait forever to get an appointment!!
I will continue to use them and recommend them!!
